entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
